recipesJson.name: Dew My Nana
recipesJson.author: RdaJunkie
recipesJson.description:
Honeydew and banana, fucking addictive. 
I'm still playing with this one. A touch of almond is pretty damn good with it as well. Coconut used low enough is good too.
Your favorite banana will work just keep it relatively low so it doesn't distract the honeydew

reviews.text: I am also very pleased with the honeydew banana cream combo. In my recipe Monkey Dew I used 1% of LB Blue Raspberry, for an awkward twist you never get bored of :)
I will be mixing  this expect a review
